items.title: CEO Ryan Cohen says GameStop will focus on trading cards, not video games, as stock plummets 20%
items.description: Former video game stronghold is going all in on something entirely different.

items.title: ‘College doesn’t carry the same ROI it once did’: 70% of teens say their parents support them going to trade school or getting an apprenticeship
items.description: Parents are becoming more accepting of alternative post-high school plans.

items.title: Tombstone is introducing new pizzas with a ‘French Fry crust’
She helped build Disney’s theme park database. Now Sheila Jordan is leading a $38.5 billion Fortune 500 giant’s digital transformation efforts
items.description: Sheila Jordan is leading Fortune 500 company Honeywell’s digital transformation efforts.

items.title: Critics urge the New York Stock Exchange to reject listing JBS, one of the world’s largest meat companies, claiming it’s illegally profiting from deforested land in Brazil
items.description: JBS expects its shares to begin trading Friday on the NYSE.
